name: Rzemie
description:
Roll the dice to decide about fate of your shop. Travel, gather resources and craft magic items to sell them. 

Controls

All controls are through mouse, in depth mechanics are explained in game. Game ends when player dies, or after 10 days, and then score is calculated.

Known bugs and mistakes

- in inventory UI, Wood changes name to Mushrooms, scrapped idea, but in the backend it's the same thing

Heavily  inspired by great roll and write games Voyages and Utopia Engine.
Made for Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam 2022.
